snippet: New York is expected to report a drop in student performance this week as a result of tougher testing standards, giving Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg a potential public relations problem.
abstract: New York State Education Dept expects drastic drops in student performance across the state following use of tougher exams, giving Mayor Michael R Bloomberg potential public relations problem five months before he leaves office; state was among first to create tests aligned with Common Core standards, but exams were met with mixed reviews.
lead_paragraph: New York is expected to report a drop in student performance this week as a result of tougher testing standards, giving Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg a potential public relations problem.

headline.main: Results of New Testing Standard Could Complicate Bloomberg’s Final Months
headline.print_headline: In Results of Tougher Tests, A Challenge for Bloomberg
